questions.question: What is the primary textual information displayed prominently across the top of this rectangular food product label?

What is the detailed measurement unit specified for the serving size on this food item label?

What is the total number of servings this package contains, according to the nutrition information provided?
According to the nutrition facts, how many calories are present in a single serving of this food item?
Based on the label, how many calories are derived from fat in one serving of this food product?
What is the total amount of fat, in grams, found in a single serving, as displayed on the label?
What is the stated amount, in milligrams, of sodium present within one serving of this food product?
How many milligrams of potassium are listed per serving on the nutrition label of this food item?
As indicated on the label, what is the total amount of carbohydrates, in grams, found in a single serving of this product?
Based on the label, what is the amount of dietary fiber, in grams, included in one serving of this food?
What is the quantity of protein, expressed in grams, in a single serving, as indicated by this food label?
What percentage of the daily recommended value of Vitamin A does one serving provide, as per the label?
According to the nutrition label, what percentage of the recommended daily intake of calcium does a serving of this product supply?
